name: Federal National Mortgage Association et al., Appellants, v. Ohio Farmers Insurance Co.
name_abbreviation: Federal National Mortgage Ass'n v. Ohio Farmers Insurance

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
Mr. Justice Roberts and Mr. Justice Manderino dissent.
parties: Federal National Mortgage Association et al., Appellants, v. Ohio Farmers Insurance Co.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. All parties to bear own costs.
Mr. Justice Roberts and Mr. Justice Manderino dissent.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Michael J. Stack, Jr., with him O’Halloran, Stack <& Smith, for original plaintiff, appellant.
M. Stuart Goldin, with him Isenberg, Goldin & Blumberg, for interpleaded plaintiffs, appellants, at No. 418.
Joseph Read, with him Swartz, Campbell & Detweiler, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Federal National Mortgage Association et al., Appellants, v. Ohio Farmers Insurance Co.
Argued November 10, 1972.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
Michael J. Stack, Jr., with him O’Halloran, Stack <& Smith, for original plaintiff, appellant.
M. Stuart Goldin, with him Isenberg, Goldin & Blumberg, for interpleaded plaintiffs, appellants, at No. 418.
Joseph Read, with him Swartz, Campbell & Detweiler, for appellee.
May 4, 1973:
